price: Ми смо ти дали седам стиха, који се понављају, а и величанствени Кур'ан.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
